price: ߊߟߊ߫ ߸ ߏ߬ ߟߋ ߤߊ߬ߙߌ߬ߖߍ߰ߟߊ ߘߌ߫ ߝߊ߲߬ߞߊ߬ߡߊ߫ ߝߊ߬ߛߊ߲߬ߡߊ߲ ߠߋ߬
arabic: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ هُوَ ٱلرَّزَّاقُ ذُو ٱلۡقُوَّةِ ٱلۡمَتِينُ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: inna al-laha huwa al-razāqu dhū al-quwati al-matīnu
